description: This file defines a React component named TemplatePreview that displays a preview of a message template, including header, body, footer, and buttons with variable substitutions. It references utility functions and constants for rendering and labels.

methods.name: applyVariables
methods.description: Replaces placeholders in the text with corresponding variable values from the variables object.

methods.name: TemplatePreview({ name, language, category, body = '', footer = '', buttons = [], variables = {} })

ctags.name: TemplatePreview
ctags.pattern: /^export default function TemplatePreview({ name, language, category, body = '', footer = '', butt/
ctags.signature: ({ name, language, category, body = '', footer = '', buttons = [], variables = {} })
